lead_paragraph: Proposed state legislation that would require judges to favor heterosexual couples over same-sex couples in adoptions and foster care placements is blatantly unconstitutional, critics of the bill say.
snippet: Proposed state legislation that would require judges to favor heterosexual couples over same-sex couples in adoptions and foster care placements is blatantly unconstitutional, critics of the bill say.

headline.main: Gay Rights Advocates Vow to Fight Utah Bill on Adoptions
headline.print_headline: Foes Vow to Fight Bill in Utah on Adoptions

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
